How much time do I have to go to my lunch with Sarah on 2024-05-15. Give me the result in the format 'HH:MM'.

To determine how much time you have before your lunch with Sarah, I need to find out what time your lunch is scheduled for and what the current time is.

First, I will call the `get_current_day` function to get the current date.

```
<function=get_current_day>{}</function>
```

The current date is 2024-05-15. Now, I need to find out what time your lunch with Sarah is scheduled for. To do this, I will call the `get_day_calendar_events` function to get all the events scheduled for today.

```
<function=get_day_calendar_events>{"day": "2024-05-15"}</function>
```
